snippet: A new document reveals that JPMorgan Chase and federal regulators fought over access to bank employee interviews, eventually pitting the Justice Department against the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency.
lead_paragraph: A new document reveals that JPMorgan Chase and federal regulators fought over access to bank employee interviews, eventually pitting the Justice Department against the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency.

headline.main: How Agencies Clashed on Bank’s Madoff Files
